        public Device(java.lang.String name,
              Room room,
              Consumption consumption)
        Creates device with given name and consumption in given room.
        Parameters:
        name - string name of the device
        room - room for the device to spawn in
        consumption - consumption of the device

    • Method Detail

      • getConsumption

        public Consumption getConsumption()
        Returns consumption of the device.
        Returns:
        object representing consumption of the device

      • setContent

        public void setContent(boolean content)
        Sets if there is any content of the device.
        Parameters:
        content - boolean value representing if device has any content true if device has content, sets amount of content to 100 false otherwise

      • repair

        public boolean repair()
        Repairs the device. Works only for broken device.
        Overrides:
        repair in class Tool
        Returns:
        boolean value representing whether device was repaired true device was repaired false otherwise

      • nextRound

        public void nextRound()
        Moves time for the device to the next round. Device status is set to IDLE, as anybody can use a device only for one round.
        Specified by:
        nextRound in interface RoundClock
        Overrides:
        nextRound in class Tool

      • use

        public boolean use()
        Uses the device. Device can be used only when IDLE and not BROKEN. Device can be used only by one person at a time.
        Overrides:
        use in class Tool
        Returns:
        boolean value representing whether the device has been used true device was used, i.e. was IDLE and isn't BROKEN false otherwise

      • takeContent

        public void takeContent()
        Removes content from the device. Device becomes empty.

      • refill

        public void refill()
        Refills content of the device.

      • notifyAllObservers

        public void notifyAllObservers(java.lang.String whatToDo)
        Notifies all observers of the tool.
        Overrides:
        notifyAllObservers in class Tool
        Parameters:
        whatToDo - string message what to do
